verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: had] [ARG1: a testy exchange with a reporter] [ARGM-LOC: outside the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-TMP: as she pressed him about his longtime lawyer Michael Cohen , who is under federal criminal investigation] .

President Donald Trump had a testy exchange with a reporter outside the White House on Friday as [ARG0: she] [V: pressed] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: about his longtime lawyer Michael Cohen , who is under federal criminal investigation] .

President Donald Trump had a testy exchange with a reporter outside the White House on Friday as she pressed him about [ARG1: his longtime lawyer Michael Cohen] , [R-ARG1: who] [V: is] [ARG2: under federal criminal investigation] .
